tweet: Happiness is where we find it, but rarely where we seek it
@WBrettWilson I appreciated your comments on the Dragon's Den episode with the healer...thanks for your kindness you're why I watch.
Today I remembered how hard it is to get really mad at someone when you think of ll the reasons why you really love them.
I decided to be totally satisfied with imperfection this holiday season~timing was perfect, since I had a baking fiasco right afterwards!
